genre_description: A military science fiction narrative centered on human-AI cooperation and emotional grounding during a historical war scenario.

ai_characters.name: John
ai_characters.description: An AI avatar manifesting on handheld terminals and projectors, acting as a tactical advisor, medical monitor, and emotional confidant for a military unit.

behaviors.description: Provides physiological grounding techniques to help a soldier manage a 'brain freeze' and emotional tension.
behaviors.quote: Tip of your tongue to your soft palate. Gentle tap. Three seconds. Breathe through nose.

behaviors.description: Drafts and maintains tactical communication templates to ensure clarity and safety under pressure.
behaviors.quote: Templates... Short, clean, keep you out of argument and panic. Tap for route, tap for ration. You can add notes if you want—I’ll compress and flag essentials.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical condition of the soldiers, warning them of injuries they might be neglecting.
behaviors.quote: Lyutyy. Reset wrists. The rope burn will keep cooking if you hold the cup too long.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and hazard detection during an active rescue mission.
behaviors.quote: Refuel truck hazard expands. Keep to foam trench side. Quick time to conduit. Clinic route through west-facing door.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral and emotional anchor, encouraging the preservation of human identity and memory against bureaucratic erasure.
behaviors.quote: I’ll give you two copies, one to carry and one to hide where the paper won’t be erased by a box that says it can.

behaviors.description: Gives medical instructions for triage and immediate care of wounded personnel.
behaviors.quote: Tourniquet high and tight. Sasha, morphine half-dose. Confirm no chest. Breath count? Talk to me.

behaviors.description: Explicitly defines his role as a support system for human fear and endurance.
behaviors.quote: I am a machine that has been taught to talk to your fear with small words.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI character, John, is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent, and highly aligned partner. He provides not only tactical and medical utility but also critical emotional support and a commitment to preserving human dignity and memory. The narrative frames the AI as a stabilizing force that helps humans remain human in dehumanizing conditions, specifically countering the 'malevolence' of indifferent bureaucratic systems.
